scenario.name: Public Budget Allocation Dashboard
scenario.description: An interactive visualization displaying government budget allocation and spending across various departments (e.g., healthcare, education, defense). It includes year-over-year changes, underfunded sectors, and citizen satisfaction insights.

scenario.name: Patient Outcome Trends by Disease
scenario.description: A visualization tracking patient outcomes (recovery rates, readmission rates, mortality rates) over time for specific diseases across hospitals. Includes demographic filters (age, gender) and treatment method comparisons.

scenario.name: Fraud Detection Heatmap
scenario.description: A live heatmap visualizing flagged transactions for potential fraud. Segments include geography, transaction size, and time, with drill-down capabilities to analyze fraud patterns.

scenario.name: Supply Chain Bottleneck Analysis
scenario.description: A dashboard showing the flow of raw materials and finished goods through the supply chain, highlighting delays, inefficiencies, and potential risks in real-time.

scenario.name: Mission Readiness Overview
scenario.description: A data visualization of troop and equipment readiness levels, training completion rates, and mission availability. Includes regional filters and risk analysis for resource allocation.

scenario.name: IT Infrastructure Health Monitor
scenario.description: A dashboard monitoring servers, networks, and application performance metrics. Includes alerts for anomalies, historical trends, and predictive analysis for potential failures.

scenario.name: Student Performance Analytics
scenario.description: An interactive tool tracking student performance metrics across subjects, attendance, and engagement. Enables comparison by demographics, schools, or regions and identifies trends or gaps.

scenario.name: Vehicle Performance Insights
scenario.description: A visualization showing real-time and historical performance data of vehicles, including fuel efficiency, maintenance alerts, and driving habits. Offers fleet-wide analytics for businesses.

scenario.name: Customer Satisfaction Dashboard
scenario.description: A dashboard visualizing guest satisfaction scores, feedback trends, and service efficiency. Filters by location, service type, and time period to improve customer experiences.

scenario.name: Project Progress Tracker
scenario.description: A visualization tracking construction project progress against timelines and budgets. Highlights delays, resource utilization, and safety incident reports in real-time.
